thread.title: Ivanka Trump's Jewelry Company Owes $5k in Back Taxes
thread.title_full: Ivanka Trump's Jewelry Company Owes $5k in Back Taxes

author: Jaya Saxena
title: Ivanka Trump's Jewelry Company Owes $5k in Back Taxes
text:
Ivanka Trump's Jewelry Company Owes $5k in Back Taxes 
It's just the latest of her business woes. Getty Pool/Pool By Jaya Saxena Feb 22, 2017 We all know Trump refuses to release his taxes, but he isn't the only one in the family with IRS troubles. In January, the New York Department of State issued a warrant against Ivanka Trump's business, Ivanka Trump Fine Jewelry, for $5,165.06 in unpaid taxes. Which is not much by Trump family standards, but hey... It's not the only warrant connected to the Trump name. There's an outstanding balance of $5,157.29 from two warrants against Trump Tower Cafe . Trump Mortgage LLC , which launched in 2006 after Trump said it was a "great time to start a mortgage company" and then folded in 2007, still owes $1,580.06. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Elle.com has reached out to Ivanka Trump Fine Jewelry about the debt, which the state has a right to collect "through a levy , income execution , and seizure and sale of property." But this is just the latest of Ivanka's business woes, as department stores and online retailers continue to pull her brands amid boycotts and protests. Jewelers connected to Ivanka Trump Fine Jewelry also say that once the current inventory is sold off, the company will shutter . Wow, and even after all that free press from Kellyanne Conway !
